name: PrimaVie®
description: PrimaVie® is a high quality, clinically studied, Purified Shilajit from the Himalayas, containing dibenzo-α-pyrones (DBPs), DBP-Chromoproteins (DCP), Fulvic Acid and over 40 different minerals. Its’ history of use goes back to The Indus Valley Civilization, 3,000 B.C., where British archeologists have found evidence of use of Shilajit, which is considered the greatest rasayana in Ayurveda. PrimaVie® is an ideal anti-aging product.
